quote: I had turned away from the picture and was going back to the world where events move, men change, light flickers, life flows in a clear stream, no matter whether over mud or over stones.
quote_letters: I HAD TURNED AWAY FROM THE PICTURE AND WAS GOING BACK TO THE WORLD WHERE EVENTS MOVE MEN CHANGE LIGHT FLICKERS LIFE FLOWS IN A CLEAR STREAM NO MATTER WHETHER OVER MUD OR OVER STONES
